## type Reactions

Reactions

```go
type Reactions struct {
    Ctx    *bot.Context
    Config []struct {
        Emoji   string   `yaml:"emoji"`
        Phrases []string `yaml:"phrases"`
    }
}
```

### func \(\*Reactions\) React

```go
func (r *Reactions) React(ctx *bot.Context)
```

React to any of the listed phrases with an emote
